wikipedia_page.main:
Diljit Singh Rana, Baron Rana OBE (born 20 September 1938) is a British politician and member of the House of Lords. Having originally been a crossbencher, he took the Conservative whip in 2016.  He was married to Shruti, Lady Rana.
On 16 June 2004, he was created a life peer as Baron Rana, of Malone in the County of Antrim.

response: Lord Diljit Rana, Baron Rana, chairman of the Thanksgiving Square charity, said the aim of the project was to create some public space for giving thanks.
